history.text: Hello, we are supposed to talk about the Shape of Water
First of all, did you like it?

I did like the movie it was a great fantasy movie.
 How about you?
I also liked it a lot, the script and actors were really good

I really like Guillermo del Toro's work; What was your favorite thing about the movie?
\
I really loved the special effects, the opening scene was my favourite
What about you?
What was your favorite thing about the movie?
It was a very interesting movie, I liked the story line and it was different from other movies.

Yeah that'
s true
And what do you think about Sally Hawkins the main actress?
I really liked her performance, she was very convincing, her performance pulled at the heart strings.
Yeah she is a really good actress
And what are your thoughts about Guillermo del Toro as a director
I really like his work; he has a variety of movies and I like them all. What about you?
I admire him, I consider Guillermo as one of the best directors for fantasy movies
Also I just reviewed in the document that the movie got a score of 92% in Rotten Tomatoes, do you think this score is fair?
Yes; I think that is a fair and accurate score.
Yeah I thought the same, considering rotten tomatoes is harsh on most movies
What do you think about Strickland?
I think that he is a good Character actor and plays police and military personnel very well.
Yeah he is good, and funny sometimes
And what about Giles, Elisa's friend?

Giles performance was good as well. The movie had many twists; I usually figure out what is coming in a movie
. I was quite surprised with this movie, do you agree?
Yeah I also agree it was different from other movies
Although the dancing scene is kind of awkward don't you agree?
Yes I agree, how do you feel about the use of sign language?
It was a feature nicely implemented in the movie and the actress was really good at it
Yes she was very convincing. Did you like how dark the movie was at times?
Yeah I did it was really nice, mainly the underwater scenes don't you think?
Yes it added interest
Now about the key scenes shown in the document, what you think about scene number 3
I liked how Strickland perfect world was falling apart after he couldnt find the creature

It was a surprising plot twist that I did not see coming. I grew to hate Strickland's character in the movie and he got what he deserved. They had made reference to her scars previously and she had been found by a river; but I still did not see that coming. What is your opinion?
Yeah as I was saying I loved how Strickland perfect world was falling apart after he couldn't find the creature. But yeah I totally agree he got what he deserved
Whats your opinion about the critical response that the movie got in general
Usually I don't follow or agree with most critics, but I think that I agree with them. It was a weird and wonderful movie.
Yeah thats true I think the same
And whats do you think about Octavias Spencer's role on the movie?
I am familiar with her as an actress and I think that she played an important part to in the movie as the interpreter. She was kind of a motherly figure in Elisa's life.
Yeah that's true although I think it was a big cliché in the movie. But her performance was really good

uid1response.feedback: It took a lot of time to answer making the conversation painfully slow. I am almost certain I was talking with an AI, and improving the answering speed would be a huge improvement. The conversation feels natural most of the time, but the time it takes to answer is just not normal.
